Articles.Content: I will be keeping a close eye on this thread over the coming days, as the use of this gear becomes more and more rediculous,,This is great.

Based on my limited knowledge of unity I\'d say that making unpowered versions shouldn\'t be harder than exposing another line to the .cfg, I\'ll have a chat with r4m0n about this. Any part in particular you would like to see unpowered?

Are all parts too big or is it just one/several of the parts?
Why this parts 'Is\'t avaliable on this version of KSP (14.4)???

link=topic=10662.msg162486#msg162486 date=1334742445]

Why this parts 'Is\'t avaliable on this version of KSP (14.4)???

It may be that your copy of MuMechLib.dll needs to be updated.

I am downloaded newest MuMechLib.dll....

Dont work!
You have to replace any previous versions of the MuMechLib.dll with this or the one from Damned Aerospace for this to work.
Trying to think of other uses for it.

That bottom rotor is a push rotor, but flips around the moment it hits that bottom joint node.

Probably the rotors fault more than the robotics.

Are all parts too big or is it just one/several of the parts?

The rotatron is fine and the strut lengths are fine. And so is the claw as long as you aren\'t going to stick it on the end of an arm. The struts and joints feel much too bulky compared to the existing parts.

Oh and a base plate of some sort for the claw would be really neat. Possibly with rotation functionality. And while we\'re wishing cylinders of different lengths would also be nice.

But really, this is an awesome mod. Seriously, how many mods lets you make a walking launchpad?

Please, time for proper battleships 8)

Uch? Senkan Yamato? 8)

Damn you, japan! > I was just about to release my own loader arm

And, well, I\'ll release it anyway, as a compact, ready to use one-piece solution

I\'ll slim down the trusses and hinges when I get home, might make a smaller claw as well.

Looking good Tosh! Working on a forklift cart?

Looking good Tosh! Working on a forklift cart?
An attachable fork, actually. And a truck with working cargo area.
I wonder if it would be possible to build a proper humanoid robot...

I wonder if it would be possible to build a proper humanoid robot...

It\'s entirely possible, but it\'ll handle like this guy

http://www.foddy.net/Athletics.html

I think this is one of the nist brilliant mods ever made for KSP. You can do amazingly crazy stuff with it. 8)

Keep up the good work, Damnyoujapan.
This is intense
Oooo rotation. Im going to make something like this.

Tosh, i love you!!!!!

For some reason, when I split parts into different groups and try to launch the ship, the groups won\'t save.

For example if I had two groups:

Group 1, Which contains

Part 1

Part 2

And then I had Group 2, Which contains

Part 3

Part 4

When I hit launch, it will merge group 1 & 2 together and I\'ll end up with one group containing all 4 parts. I also tried using a fresh install of KSP .14.4 and used the version of mechjeb included, and I\'m still having this problem. Any idea what could be causing this?

Are group 1 and group 2 named both named 'new group' by any chance?

Only groups with unique names will work.

Are group 1 and group 2 named both named 'new group' by any chance?

Only groups with unique names will work.

Indeed they where ;D

I changed the names of the groups and it\'s working now, Thanks!
